author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...SONIA WEAKENS INTO A POST-TROPICAL REMNANT LOW...
summary: ...SONIA WEAKENS INTO A POST-TROPICAL REMNANT LOW... As of 2:00 AM PDT Wed Oct 29 the center of Sonia was located near 15.3, -126.1 with movement W at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...SONIA WEAKENS INTO A POST-TROPICAL REMNANT LOW... As of 2:00 AM PDT Wed Oct 29 the center of Sonia was located near 15.3, -126.1 with movement W at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Post-Tropical Cyclone Sonia (EP3/EP182025)
